title: How to Make Peanut Butter Brownie Cupcakes

steps.headline: Pre-heat the oven to 350 degrees F (180 degrees C).
Prepare the muffin tray by lining them with paper cupcake liners.
Follow the brownie mix box for directions on making cake-like brownies.
Fill the cupcake liners about halfway with the brownie batter.
Carefully sprinkle about a tablespoon of peanut butter chips on the top of the batter.
steps.description: If using peanut butter cups, press one down in the center until the batter rises to the top of the candy.

steps.headline: Layer about a spoonful of batter on top of the chips.
Set on the side to cool and store in an airtight container.

text: Pre-heat the oven to 350 degrees F (180 degrees C).  Prepare the muffin tray by lining them with paper cupcake liners.  Follow the brownie mix box for directions on making cake-like brownies.  Fill the cupcake liners about halfway with the brownie batter.  Carefully sprinkle about a tablespoon of peanut butter chips on the top of the batter. If using peanut butter cups, press one down in the center until the batter rises to the top of the candy. Layer about a spoonful of batter on top of the chips.  Bake for about 18 to 20 minutes.  Set on the side to cool and store in an airtight container.  Finished.
